title: Stylish, Luxury Glen Park Home With Views | Elite Leasing
posting_body: ['Stylish, Luxury Glen Park Home With Views | Elite Leasing', 'PROPERTY SUMMARY:', 'Address: 179 Brompton Ave, San Francisco, CA 94131', 'Rent:  $7,975/mo.', 'Security Deposit: 1.5 x Rent', 'Bedrooms:  3', 'Bathrooms: 2.5', 'Parking: 1 car garage', 'Amenities: Multiple Patios & Backyard', 'Pets: Considered with addn.', 'deposit', 'Available Date: Now', 'Lease Term: 1 year', 'Utilities: None Included.', 'Owner will maintain landscaping.', 'Property Type: Unfurnished', 'Floors: Hardwood', 'Laundry:', 'In unit', 'Application Fee: $40 per person', 'Renters Insurance Required', 'CONTACT INFORMATION:', "Please use the 'Reply' button above to reach us", 'Agent Brian Brown (BRE #01461194), Vanguard Properties', 'Agent: Mahesh Patki (BRE#01948053), Vanguard Properties', 'Agent: Marika Neemia (BRE#01785680), Vanguard Property Management', 'PROPERTY DESCRIPTION:', 'Make this stylish, luxury home in Glen Park your next residence.', 'Features include:', '-\tOpen floor plan living, dining & kitchen on the top level.', 'Vaulted ceilings and wide plank oak flooring.', '-\tKitchen features top of the line stainless steel appliances & custom wood cabinetry.', 'Enjoy the panoramic city views from the big picture windows.', '-\tOn the lower level are three bedrooms and two baths.', 'The Principal suite has an attached bath and plenty of closet space.', '-\tBaths feature designer finishes and fixtures.', '-\tEnjoy the outdoors on your decks or in the beautiful landscaped backyard.', '-\tWasher/dryer in unit for your convenience.', '-\tLarge 1 car garage with space for storage.', '-\tYou are a half-block away from all the shopping and dining option on Diamond and Chenery Streets.', '-\tTransit options include Tech Shuttles, BART and MUNI lines', '-\tEasy access to both Hwy 101 and 280.', '*Note: Furniture shown is for staging purposes only.', 'Unit will be delivered unfurnished*', '*Any square footage numbers listed have been provided by Owner and are approximate*', 'View our other available rentals at: <URL>', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.']
